tasks.check: deno check mod.ts && deno check extensions/mod.ts && deno check patch/mod.ts
tasks.test: deno test --parallel --allow-read=tests --allow-write=tests --coverage=cov_profile tests/ && deno coverage cov_profile --lcov --output=cov_profile.lcov && genhtml -o cov_profile/html cov_profile.lcov
tasks.test:auto: deno task test:clean || true && deno task test
